whoiam.subtitle: A little bit about me
whoiam.title: Who I am?
whoiam.content:
I'm Imanol Rodriguez de Maya a developer based in Barcelona, Spain. Since I was a kid I'm a person passionate with learn new things. With that attitude I discovered the software development and the beautiful concept that comes with it of be able to build things from scratch just imagining and doing some code.

Since I discovered the development I've been doing projects and working in differents companies always linked with the web technologies and environments, from simple website to complex web apps.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Some services that I can provide

website.title: Website
website.description: Get a fast, accessible and SEO friendly website managed from a CMS (Wordpress, Drupal, Contentful, etc) based on your designs.

webapp.title: Webapp
webapp.description: Get a higly performant web application with authentication and complex features.

ecommerce.title: Ecommerce
ecommerce.description: Get a ready to sell ecommerce with a fast website and optimized process of checkout.

support.title: Support
support.description: Get technical support or help in your web projects.
